member.name: T:Goedel.Account.Client.AccountClient
member.summary: The RecryptClient class is a convenience interface to a RecryptService instance. This provides a single point at which dispatch methods for the various transactions may perform sanity checking on input and output variables, enforce timeouts, attempt retry etc.

member.name: M:Goedel.Account.Client.AccountClient.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Default constructor, create a MeshClient for the specified service.
member.param: The recryption service to connect to.

member.name: M:Goedel.Account.Client.AccountClient.Update(System.String)
member.summary: Update a member entry in an existing recryption group
member.param: The identifier of the member entry to update (what??)

member.name: M:Goedel.Account.Client.AccountClient.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Request the account associated with the specified account ID.

member.name: T:Goedel.Recrypt.Client.SessionAccount
member.summary: Manage a set of application sessions that are recryption sessions bound to a single personal session. This allows for methods such as 'get set of candidate keys'

member.name: M:Goedel.Recrypt.Client.SessionAccount.#ctor(Goedel.Mesh.Portal.Client.SessionPersonal,Goedel.Mesh.AccountProfile)
member.summary: Construct a SessionRecryption from a personal session.
member.param: The personal session to construct from.

member.name: M:Goedel.Recrypt.Client.SessionAccount.#ctor(Goedel.Mesh.Portal.Client.SessionPersonal,System.String)
member.summary: Constrcut a SessionAccount by fetching the specified account from the Account service. If necessary, authentication credentials from the specified personal session will be used.

member.name: M:Goedel.Recrypt.Client.SessionAccount.GetAccountPofile(System.String)
member.summary: Resolve an account identifier by making an account data request to the corresponding Account server.
